title: International Relations and Global Governance

vocab.definition: Supreme authority of state over its territory and people
Practice of conducting international relations through negotiation
International organization promoting peace and cooperation
Process of increasing worldwide economic and cultural integration
Fundamental rights and freedoms belonging to all people

teachingNotes: Introduce international system and global challenges. Use current events to illustrate concepts.

sample.question: What describes supreme authority of state over territory?

truefalse.question: Diplomacy involves conducting international relations through negotiation.

multiplechoice.question: What organization promotes international peace and cooperation?

fillintheblank.question: ________ is increasing worldwide economic and cultural integration.

shortanswer.question: What are main purposes of United Nations?
